title: en manam
sahitya:
en manam UshalADa viDalAmA en anaiyE un aDimai


anupallavi

  dunmati paDarnda tUrttargaL nirainda tollulagil allodu paghalum uzhalum


caraNam    shol manam eTTAda svayambhu mahEshan tUyiDam amarnda sarva manNgaLE
 tollUrgaLil nar-guNashIlar nirai nanganallUr vaLar rAja rAjEshvari
